mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment (board_id, user_id, comment_content, comment_date) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT bc.board_comment_id AS commentId, bc.board_id AS boardId, bc.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, bc.comment_content AS content, bc.comment_date AS date FROM board_comment bc JOIN user u ON bc.user_id = u.user_id WHERE bc.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY bc.comment_date DESC
